meanings.definition: The state of being without defense or protection.
meanings.sent1: The defenselessnesses of the small kitten made it an easy target for the predator.
meanings.sent2: The defenselessnesses of the village was evident when the invaders attacked.
meanings.sent3: The defenselessnesses of the teddy bear made it an easy target for the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: The defenselessnesses of the newborn chick was a stark reminder of the harsh realities of nature.
meanings.sent5: The defenselessnesses of the lost child tugged at the heartstrings of the kind stranger.

meanings.definition: The vulnerability or helplessness of being unable to defend oneself.
meanings.sent1: The defenselessnesses of the injured bird touched the hearts of the rescuers.
meanings.sent2: The defenselessnesses of the elderly man made him an easy target for scams.
meanings.sent3: The defenselessnesses of the baby deer trying to stand up was both adorable and pitiful.
meanings.sent4: The defenselessnesses of the fragile butterfly in the storm symbolized the fragility of life.
meanings.sent5: The defenselessnesses of the lost child in the crowded mall caused panic among the parents.
